credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
title: Border
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, discontinuous tape
description: Border with narrow band in repeat pattern of birds in flight and geometric foliated forms from which three large rounded pendants are suspended. In each, a double-headed eagle surmounted by a crown and surrounded by foliated and floral forms. Border consists of smaller pendants, each composed of a single geometric motif.
name: Border
